phrs.translation: 任性, 不稳定, 反复无常, 不稳
有勇无谋, 勇往直前

sentences.sentence: He doesn't even dwell on our past waywardness.
sentences.translation: 他甚至不纠缠于过去的任性。

sentences.sentence: I will heal their waywardness and love them freely, for my anger has turned away from them.
sentences.translation: 我必医治他们背道的病，甘心爱他们，因为我的怒气向他们转消。

sentences.sentence: Against a background like this, a little waywardness in the world of macroeconomics seems entirely forgivable.
sentences.translation: 基于上述家庭背景，这位有点任性的宏观经济学大师完全是可以得到谅解的。
